name: swarmclause-agents
description: OpenClaw-enabled autonomous agents for SWARMCLAUSE negotiation platform

scripts.start:buyers: node -e "const {AgentLauncher} = require('./agent-launcher'); const launcher = new AgentLauncher(); launcher.launchBuyerAgents();"
scripts.start:sellers: node -e "const {AgentLauncher} = require('./agent-launcher'); const launcher = new AgentLauncher(); launcher.launchSellerAgents();"
scripts.start:simulator: node -e "const {AgentLauncher} = require('./agent-launcher'); const launcher = new AgentLauncher(); launcher.launchSimulatorAgent();"
scripts.start:mediator: node -e "const {AgentLauncher} = require('./agent-launcher'); const launcher = new AgentLauncher(); launcher.launchMediatorAgent();"

author: SWARMCLAUSE
